mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) VALUES(seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, tt.* FROM (SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY ref DESC, step ASC)tt) WHERE rn >= #{startNum} AND rn <=#{endNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=SYSDATE WHERE seq=#{seq}
UPDATE board SET hit=hit+1 WHERE seq=#{seq}
UPDATE board SET step=step+1 WHERE ref=#{ref} AND step>#{step}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref, lev, step, pseq) VALUES(seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{lev}, #{step}, #{pseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET reply=reply+1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE board SET subject="[원글이 삭제된 답글] "||subject pseq = -1, step=step-1 WHERE pseq= #{seq}
UPDATE board SET reply=reply-1 WHERE seq IN(SELECT pseq FROM board WHERE pseq=#{seq})
